sentences: LKT began his music career with Fuji music in 1993 but later changed his style of music to hip hop but rose to prominence in 2007 when he featured in the hit song Yahooze, released by Olu Maintain, a Nigerian hip-hop artiste, lkt made the track a hit due to his fuji style which was sensational at that time.
In January 2011, he released a song titled "Follow Follow" featuring P-Square and the song was preceded by  "Alaye Mi.
The remix of the song which featured  Davido was released in March 2012.
